name: Blue Contact Lens
description: Vibrant blue contact lenses that enhance your natural eye color with a stunning blue hue. Perfect for everyday wear or special occasions.

name: Brown Contact Lens
description: Rich brown contact lenses that add depth and warmth to your eyes. Ideal for a natural yet enhanced look.

name: Cat Eye Contact Lens
description: Dramatic cat eye contact lenses for a bold, feline-inspired look. Stand out with this unique design.

name: Galaxy Contact Lens
description: Cosmic galaxy pattern contact lenses featuring a mesmerizing starry night design. Perfect for parties and events.

name: Gray Contact Lens
description: Sophisticated gray contact lenses that provide a cool, modern aesthetic. Great for a subtle yet striking appearance.

name: Green Contact Lens
description: Vivid green contact lenses that bring out the natural beauty of your eyes with an emerald glow.

name: Hazelnut Contact Lens
description: Warm hazelnut contact lenses with a natural, earthy tone. Perfect for achieving a subtle enhancement.

name: Stars Contact Lens
description: Magical star-patterned contact lenses that add a twinkling effect to your eyes. Ideal for special occasions and photos.
